message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the value of the product you're offering, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than that to you. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value you see in the product, I would like to stick to my initial budget. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  Let's try this - $11,500 and we have a deal.  This product will truly benefit you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I am still unable to go above $10,000. Could we possibly reach a mutual agreement at this price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair. $10,500 is my final offer. This is a great deal for something that will benefit you so much.
